about_the_game:
.

Her name is Glória, and the pleasure is all yours.

GZLNA is a short sci-fi cinematic / arcade experience that takes place in a not so distant future, smack in the middle of Brazil.
Wreck house in Goiás on a top down / grid based shooter style combat. ( WARNING - THIS IS NOT A TWIN STICK SHOOTER )

Educate yourself:

- This is not an {X} Like. Maybe it is. Don't be a nerd.
- Short Playtime. 40 to 60 minutes for a single playthrough, 1.5 to 3 hours to 100% it, aproximately.
- Roughly 50% cinematics, 50% gameplay. If you don't skip the cutscenes, because then it would be like 0% cinematics and 50% gameplay... No, wait.
- Fresh gameplay. We promise we didn't xerox it, not explicitly.
- Top Down Grid Based Realtime Shooter Combat. Think of it as a classic dungeon crawler, but TOP DOWN, REALTIME and without the RPG stuff.
- Easy to learn. We sincerely believe your mom would be able to handle this one.
- Hard to master. :)
- Supports KEYBOARD and CONTROLLER. The Keyboard is the optimal way of putting the heat, however, the Controller works fine as well.
- Banging soundtrack. Please, have the decency of using your good sound equipment.
- Unique atmosphere. Nothing really happens in the Federal District after all.
- 3 difficulty levels. It's a breeze on EZ, on HARD, not so much.
- Upgrade System based on Score Performance. SCORE = RANK = UPGRADE POINTS
- Unlockable Dossiers with character profiles. Cuz nobody gets it anyway.
- Low price tag. Costs even less than you mom. Tell her we said hi.
- There are plans for some improvements. Input remapping and detailed graphical options, for example. This is not a promise. We don't even know you.

Don't forget to check out the Official Soundtrack for GZLNA.
You can watch the full short film version of GZLNA on our Youtube channel, by clicking on VISIT THE WEBSITE. Spoiler Alert.

This is a solo developed independent project, so manage your expectations my dear. ;)

name: GZLNA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Current Generation i5 Processors or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This project was not developed with lower spec computers in mind. It currently runs at 120+ FPS on a 4Gen i7 and a GTX 1080. It may run properly on lower spec machines. Buy at your own risk. Este projeto não foi desenvolvido com máquinas de baixo desempenho em mente. Atualmente roda em 120+fps utilizando um i7 de 4ª geração e uma GTX 1080. Provavelmente roda em máquinas inferiores. Compre por sua conta e risco.
